message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm willing to part with it for $130. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $120 is a tempting offer, I'm looking to get a bit closer to my asking price. Would you consider $125?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
